斀字的基本解释

斀
zhuó
古刑法名，即宫刑。

斀
zhú
击。

斀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》竹角切，入覺，知。］
(1)古代刑法。即宫刑。
(2)同“卓”。
[②]［zhú］
［《集韻》朱欲切，入燭，章。］
击。

斀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　斀； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页475第39
【唐韻】【廣韻】【集韻】【類篇】【韻會】?竹角切，音琢。【說文】去隂之?。書曰：劓刵斀黥。○按書呂?，今作劓刵椓黥。又【集韻】都木切，音啄。義同。　又【類篇】朱欲切，音燭。擊也。　又【集韻】殊玉切，音蜀。義同。

斀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
斀字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuó］
["Guangyun" bamboo corner cuts, enters consciousness, knows. ]
(1) Ancient criminal law. That is palace punishment.
(2) Same as "Zhuo".
[②]［zhú］
["Ji Yun" Zhu Yuqi, into the candle, chapter. ]
hit.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Bao Ji 2] [The Department of Characters] 　斀; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 475 Page 39
[Tang Yun] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Class Chapter] [Rhyme Meeting]? Bamboo corner cut, sound cut. [Said the text] Go to Yinzhi? The book said: 劓刵斀黥. ○According to the book Lu?, this is a 劓刵椓黥. Also 【Jiyun】It's all wood cutting and sound pecking. The same meaning.　[Classes] Zhu Yuqie, Yinzhu. Hit also.　[Jiyun] Shuyu cut, sound and Shu. The same meaning.
